attributes.action: Scrap traditional Religious Education in schools and replace with Anthropological studies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anthropolgy is the cultural and physical/biological study of man and human populations. Teaching this would promote religious and cultural awareness without bias. Lesson plans should/could consider and incorporate demographic (population characteristics). Our society is now hugely multicultural, education should reflect this.
